input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.h3: All in. Every Child, Every Day, Whatever It Takes!

img.alt: district three will continue to deliver food during spring break to help our families in need. however, starting monday, march 30, the delivery schedule will change. we will still be providing five days worth of food (breakfast, lunch and a snack) but deliveries will be on mondays, tuesdays and thursdays. you will still be able to pick up food from 11 am to 1 pm at our three sites: broome high school pacolet elementary school cowpens middle school please contact your student's school if you have any questions or concerns.

div.span: For those struggling with Internet access during this time, District Three will be using four of its buses as mobile hot spots. There will be Wifi with a 300-400 foot range on each bus.

img.title: grab n go meal details
img.alt: Do you need food during the closure?

div.h3: Do you need food during the closure?
div.span: If you need meals, please make sure your child's school knows. We are continuing to have families signing up daily so thank you for your patience during this process!

img.title: click here for a list of helpful resources
img.alt: Looking for help during the school closure?

div.h3: Looking for help during the school closure?
div.span: Here are a list of resources during the closure to help you during this time.

img.title: d3 message
img.alt: A Message to our D3 Community Members

div.h3: A Message to our D3 Community Members
div.span: arents, students and community members, please take a moment to hear from our D3 leaders about what's happening during these next few days.

div.h3: Save the Date! Bryson Ward Memorial Scholarship Fundraiser
div.span: April 25 will be the final year for the Bryson Ward Memorial Scholarship Fundraiser.

img.title: junior scholars recognized
img.alt: Junior Scholars recognized at Twitchell Auditorium

div.h3: Junior Scholars recognized at Twitchell Auditorium
div.span: huge congratulations to our District Three Junior Scholars who were recognized at Twitchell Auditorium at Converse College on February 26, 2020.

img.title: On February 25, 2020, the District Three board unanimously voted for the referendum resolution for Destination 3-1-1.
img.alt: District Three board unanimously approves referendum resolution

div.h3: District Three board unanimously approves referendum resolution
div.span: On February 25, 2020, the District Three board unanimously voted for the referendum resolution for Destination 3-1-1.
